review: Awesome media Device. I ended up buying 2. I would recommend this over others I have an Apple TV 2 and the Amazon fire puts it to shame. Video streams in 1080p I can also play games & music that I download from Amazon. All media is shared with devices on my account. I would recommend over any other devices. Only downside is you can not use the usb port for external hard drive. Other then that it's pretty solid & fast.
